errors.noPermissionForTarget: API key does not have permission for target: {target}
errors.noSpecificPermission: API key does not have {permission} permission for target: {target}
errors.noPermissionForNamespace: User {userId} does not have permission to namespace {namespaceId}
errors.noWritePermission: User {userId} does not have write permission to resource {resourceId} in namespace {namespaceId}
errors.userOrNamespaceRequired: Either user_id or namespace_id parameter is required
